name: Tocotoco

aura.name: eggbomb_launcher
aura.description: When activated, equips to the player and transforms into an egg launcher.

description: A frightening Pal that produces exploding eggs. It often fires these eggs from its rear end as a weapon, but when spent the Pal itself explodes.

skills.name: implode
skills.description: Risks its life to cause a violent explosion. Becomes incapacitated afterwards.

skills.name: air_cannon
skills.description: Quickly fires a burst of highly pressurized air.

skills.name: power_shot
skills.description: Charges energy into a focused blast.

skills.name: megaton_implode
skills.description: Risks life to cause a massive explosion. Those who perish for their duty become glistening stars in the night sky.

skills.name: sand_tornado
skills.description: Generates two sand tornadoes on either side before launching them at an enemy.

skills.name: power_bomb
skills.description: Charges a massive amount of energy before firing a large destructive ball.

skills.name: pal_blast
skills.description: Charges destructive energy before firing a high-powered beam forward across a wide area.
